t: Then*p he showed me Joshua the high priest standing before the Angel of the Lord,*s and Satan standing at his right hand to oppose him.
And the Lord*s said to Satan, “The Lord*s rebuke you, Satan! The Lord*s who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Is*i this not a brand plucked from the fire?”
Now*p Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and was standing before the Angel.

Then*p He answered and spoke to those who stood before Him, saying, “Take away the filthy garments from him.” And to him He said, “See, I have removed your iniquity from you, and I will clothe you with rich robes.”
And*p I said, “Let them put a clean turban on his head.” So*p they put a clean turban on his head, and they put the clothes on him. And the Angel of the Lord*s stood by.
Then*p the Angel of the Lord*s admonished Joshua, saying,

“Thus says the Lord*s of hosts: ‘If*pn you will walk in My ways, And*ld if you will keep My command, Then*ld you shall also judge My house, And*ld likewise have charge of My courts; I*ld will give you places to walk Among*ld these who stand here.
‘Hear,*ln O Joshua, the high priest, You*ld and your companions who sit before you, For*ld they are a wondrous sign; For*ld behold, I am bringing forth My Servant the BRANCH.

For*ld behold, the stone That*ld I have laid before Joshua: Upon*ld the stone are*i seven eyes. Behold,*ld I will engrave its inscription,’ Says*ld the Lord*s of hosts, ‘And*ld I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.
In*ld that day,’ says the Lord*s of hosts, ‘Everyone*ld will invite his neighbor Under*ld his vine and under his fig tree.’”
